website_summaries.verdict: A basic and good looking leather-like cover that can quickly spruce up a tired steering wheel.
pros: Made to fit most steering wheels
A good value for the money
cons: The color tends to be a little off from the pictures
The black color can get hot in to the touch in the sun

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover ! However....
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks durable and the feel to it is great, however, the reason I'm rating this 3 stars is because of the color...it's a bit deceptive. It seems the image of the gray cover on amazon is darker versus the one I got. I provided a photo, if anyone else purchased the gray option please provide an image to compare...I'm considering going for a black cover but I'll see. I really wanted a dark gray versus this lighter gray I received.
customer_reviews.author: Icarus

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover for the money but tough to get on
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks nice and feels comfortable but it is a bear to put on. Highly recommend heating cover in sunlight before attempting. I have a 15 inch steering wheel and ended up using a pry bar to get it on. Some loose threads hence lose one star but once on it looked and felt good.
customer_reviews.author: JRG

customer_reviews.title: Here’s the bottom line for me:
customer_reviews.text: For me, it’s a 5. Is it slightly lighter than the pic? Yes , and it has a very faint hint of green-gray in color. (I like that, actually.) Was it difficult to install? No, but I heated it with a blow dryer which probably helped. Is it durable? Been using if for three weeks — no problems. What about the look and feel? It’s comfortable to the touch. No odor at all. Looks nice. Classic design. Is it leather? I doubt it, but despite the word “leather” being in the title, I didn’t expect real leather for the price. Once installed, it looks and feels like leather so I’m five-star happy with this cover at this price
customer_reviews.author: Ed Roge

customer_reviews.title: Classic and smooth cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice classic wheel cover. Not bulky. Easy to install, throw in the dryer for 5 minutes on high and cup bottom and roll right on. My wheel was 15" fit perfectly. Seems well made. It is a light gray color.
customer_reviews.author: motogurl

customer_reviews.title: The grey is a little on the white side but suited my dash and seats better than a dark grey
customer_reviews.text: Well made, quality product. The grey is a little on the white side but suited my dash and seats better than a dark grey. Easy install if you've done a few before (let it warm up on your dash for 20 minutes to make it more pliable). Fits nice and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Great update to car!
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain. Really good quality construction, and by some miracle matches part of the interior of my MB.Totally revamped the look that had been marred by my used and grungy leather steering wheel. Even the service mechanics remarked on how good it looks. Negative was that it was extremely tight and hard to put on, but that is why it still looks so good and tight.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne jay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. But I ordered gray, I received a beige color. I didn’t want to go through the hassle of exchanging, because the color worked okay.
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Kim French

customer_reviews.title: Gray is lighter than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very comfortable. Great quality. Only thing is it did seem a little darker gray in picture rather than the light gray I received.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Morton

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and seems well made
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and seems well made. It fits the Nissan Titan steering wheel. A bit of work to put it on, but as a result, it fits perfectly. I wish the gray would have been a little darker. An update, I ended up going to a local store and got a darker grey steering wheel cover that better matches the Nissan console. I still would give this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover but difficult to install. Heat item up to ease installation
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D HILL

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: It was tight getting it on but once on it has not moved! Looks good, a few threads loose
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable due to the thick padding
customer_reviews.text: Love the cover. It's much easier to grip the steering wheel now and it looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: bevwin

customer_reviews.title: Used a heat gun to soften so if in summer months would probably work better to fit
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to put on but we was working on it in the cold. Used a heat gun to soften so if in summer months would probably work better to fit on
customer_reviews.author: KLJ

customer_reviews.title: it fits and looks great! I bought it for a silver Malibu
customer_reviews.text: It was a little thought to get it on since it does not stretch much. But once on, it fits and looks great! I bought it for a silver Malibu.
customer_reviews.author: Sue E.

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: The product came with the perfect size and it was comfortable. However, the material was peeling off after a few days. I contacted the seller and they refunded me ASAP. I am ordering it back.
customer_reviews.author: sakibnm

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but gray color is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product except I ordered gray and received a beige. Thought it was an error so ordered replacement. Again, package says gray but it’s tan. Should’ve read the reviews first. Great quality if you’re ok with off color.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie Hileman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits very snug no slip and definitely make the 21 yearly steering wheel look better
customer_reviews.author: walt peifer

customer_reviews.title: Color Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The pictures seem to indicate that it is darker gray than the actual color. The actual color is very light...almost white.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L Keating

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great and it was delivered in 2-days
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous fit at a fabulous price. Looks and works great and it was delivered in 2-days.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Ordered grey but it looks very tan, also doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not the best of products
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible, ripped apart in my hand after just 4 days. Looked very appealing but didn’t last at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and fits perfectly as per the listing size.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector B

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great...took some time to get on wheel but now that it is on, it is super.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and securely fits my 2014 Honda Accord Sport steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: M. Good

customer_reviews.title: very nice cover
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new steering wheel cover on my truck. It has a tight fit, so no movement and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Oleson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as specified in ad. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Welton

customer_reviews.title: Not a Universal Fit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this cover did not fit on my Dodge truck steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: games

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and feel. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent fit and feel. No odor. Color was a little lighter than it appeared, but close enough.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gick
